items.name: ClaudeUsageBar
items.tagline: Know exactly how much Claude you have left at a glance
items.description: Free, open-source macOS menu bar app that displays your Claude AI usage percentage. Get notifications before hitting your limit. Lightweight, private, and native.

items.name: skills.sh
items.description: Discover and install skills for AI agents. Skills are reusable capabilities for AI agents. Install them with a single command to enhance your agents with access to procedural knowledge: npx skills add

items.name: Pretty Prompt 1.0 Extension and Web App
items.tagline: Grammarly for prompting. Turn any text into perfect prompts.
items.description: Improve your prompts in one click without leaving your browser. Works inside ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Perplexity, Lovable, and more AI tools.

items.name: Herodot AI
items.tagline: Travel at any place like with a personal local guide
items.description: We work on Herodot AI for more than two years moving from just a nice concept to truly reliable, easy to use app. Our task is to give you a feeling that you walk and travel with a knowledgeable local friend, who can guide you pretty much like a human, telling exciting stories on what is around, whatever catches your eye.

items.name: DestMate
items.tagline: Alarm with location wake-up and earphone-only sound
items.description: Wake up exactly when you need to—even on long rides. DestMate is a smart, location-based travel alarm for commuters and travelers. Set your destination and get alerted as you approach, privately through your headphones or earbuds.

items.name: AI Proctor by Qlay
items.tagline: AI Proctor: AI that protects fairness in hiring & tests
items.description: AI Proctor by Qlay detects the most sophisticated AI-assisted and other forms of cheating during online tests and interviews. It uses a mobile app that turns the candidate's smartphone into a second camera.

items.name: RUSTWA
items.tagline: A Unofficial WhatsApp Web API built in Rust
items.description: No feature bloat. No crazy configs. Just the stuff most people actually need: send text + media, receive messages via webhooks, multi-session support, QR login with session persistence, web dashboard, fast async runtime with Tokio.

items.name: DoppelIQ Atlas
items.tagline: Pre-test marketing decisions with AI consumer simulations
items.description: DoppelIQ Atlas is an AI consumer simulation engine that lets you simulate behavior at population scale. Instead of collecting opinions from small panels, Atlas runs 100,000 consumer simulations enriched with real-world attributes.

items.name: PageSpeed.cloud
items.tagline: AI-based PageSpeed insights with clear actions for teams!
items.description: Google PageSpeed Insights provides accurate performance data, but turning that data into clear actions is often difficult. PageSpeed.cloud is an AI-based layer on top of Google PageSpeed Insights that converts technical reports into prioritized, implementation-ready action items.

items.name: Supatrack
items.description: Track calories with your friends, not alone. Supatrack makes nutrition fun with squads, challenges, and accountability. Join the movement to listen to world leading nutritionists through our exclusive podcasts and make healthy living social and motivating!
